message: Hello Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm confident it can be a great asset to you.  To start negotiations, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,500,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $1,000,000. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,100,000.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $1,100,000 is too low for me to consider. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,300,000?
I understand your position, Alice. While I respect the value of the product, I am still committed to staying within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.
